title: Add Flux-2 image generation tool
description:
Implement Flux-2 image generation tool from Black Forest Labs.

**Kie.ai URL**: https://kie.ai/flux-2

**Models to support**:
- flux-2/pro-text-to-image
- flux-2/pro-image-to-image  
- flux-2/flex-text-to-image
- flux-2/flex-image-to-image

**Key features**:
- Multi-reference consistency (up to 8 input images)
- Photoreal detail, accurate text rendering
- Aspect ratios: 1:1, 4:3, 3:4, 16:9, 9:16, 3:2, 2:3, auto
- Resolutions: 1K, 2K

**Pricing** (2025-12-06):
- Flux 2 Pro: 5 credits (~$0.025) for 1K, 7 credits (~$0.035) for 2K
- Flux 2 Flex: 14 credits (~$0.07) for 1K, 24 credits (~$0.12) for 2K

**Suggested tool name**: flux2_image (unified with mode detection)

**Implementation checklist**:
- [ ] Define Flux2ImageSchema in types.ts
- [ ] Add flux2 client method in kie-ai-client.ts
- [ ] Register tool in index.ts
- [ ] Test with MCP inspector
- [ ] Update docs/TOOLS.md
- [ ] Update docs/ENDPOINTS.md status

**Reference**: docs/ADD_TOOL_GUIDE.md

title: Update kling_video tool to support Kling 2.6
description:
GOAL: Update existing kling_video tool to support Kling 2.6 with native audio generation

DELIVERABLE: Updated kling_video tool supporting v2.6 models with audio

---
ðŸ“˜ IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE (READ FIRST):
- docs/ADD_TOOL_GUIDE.md
  â†’ Phase 1: Research endpoint parameters
  â†’ Phase 2: Update Zod schema, client, handler
  â†’ Phase 4: Update docs and version

---
CONTEXT: Kling 2.6 adds native audio generation (speech, sound effects, ambient) synchronized with video. This is a major upgrade from the current v2.1-pro and v2.5-turbo models.

IMPLEMENTATION STEPS:
1. Scrape https://kie.ai/kling-2-6 for new parameters
2. Update KlingVideoSchema in src/types.ts to add v2.6 models
3. Update generateKlingVideo() in src/kie-ai-client.ts for new model selection
4. Test mode detection logic
5. Update docs/TOOLS.md with new parameters

---

ðŸ“Š External Documentation:
- https://kie.ai/kling-2-6 - Playground page with parameters
- https://docs.kie.ai - API documentation

ðŸ’¡ KEY INSIGHTS:
- This is an UPDATE to existing tool, not a new tool
- Native audio is the key differentiator from v2.1/v2.5
- Should maintain backward compatibility with existing parameters
- Follow unified tool pattern with mode detection

---
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:

title: Add Kling Avatar talking avatar tool
Add Z-Image tool for fast text-to-image
Add Wan 2.2 Animate tool
description:
Implement Wan 2.2 Animate tool from Alibaba Tongyi Lab.

**Kie.ai URL**: https://kie.ai/wan-animate

**Models to support**:
- wan/2-2-animate-move (animation mode)
- wan/2-2-animate-replace (character replacement mode)

**Key features**:
- Animation mode: Transfer motion/expressions from video to static image
- Replace mode: Swap characters in video while preserving lighting/tone
- Preserves original video audio
- Resolutions: 480p, 580p, 720p
- Max video length: 30 seconds

**Pricing** (2025-12-06):
- 720p: 12.5 credits/second (~$0.0625)
- 580p: 9.5 credits/second (~$0.0475)  
- 480p: 6 credits/second (~$0.0300)

**Suggested tool name**: wan_animate (unified with mode detection)

**Mode detection**:
- Both modes require: video_url + image_url
- API model param determines mode (2-2-animate-move vs 2-2-animate-replace)

**Implementation checklist**:
- [ ] Define WanAnimateSchema in types.ts
- [ ] Add wanAnimate client method in kie-ai-client.ts  
- [ ] Register tool in index.ts
- [ ] Test with MCP inspector
- [ ] Update docs/TOOLS.md
- [ ] Update docs/ENDPOINTS.md status

**Reference**: docs/ADD_TOOL_GUIDE.md

title: Update Nano Banana to Pro version
description:
Update existing nano_banana_image tool to Nano Banana Pro (Gemini 3.0 Pro Image).

**Kie.ai URL**: https://kie.ai/nano-banana-pro

**What changed from Nano Banana to Nano Banana Pro**:
- Model: Gemini 3.0 Pro Image (was Gemini 2.5 Flash)
- Resolutions: Now supports 1K, 2K, 4K (was mainly 1K)
- Up to 8 input images for multi-reference
- Improved text rendering, character consistency
- Sharper micro-details, cleaner edges

**Updated pricing** (2025-12-06):
- 1K/2K: 18 credits (~$0.09) - was 24 credits
- 4K: 24 credits (~$0.12)

**Changes needed**:
- [ ] Update NanoBananaImageSchema to support 4K resolution
- [ ] Update schema to support up to 8 input images (image_input array)
- [ ] Update API client to use new endpoint/model
- [ ] Update tool description to mention Pro features
- [ ] Update docs/TOOLS.md
- [ ] Update docs/ENDPOINTS.md status

**Reference**: docs/ADD_TOOL_GUIDE.md

title: Add Grok Imagine tool for xAI image/video generation
MCP Server Tool Sync Workflow
description:
Establish a repeatable workflow for adding new Kie.ai endpoints to the MCP server. Includes documentation (ENDPOINTS.md, ADD_TOOL_GUIDE.md), tracking of available endpoints, and implementation of pending tools.

Goals:
1. Document current state of all tools vs available endpoints
2. Create step-by-step guide for adding new tools
3. Implement pending tools (Flux-2, Wan 2.2 Animate, Nano Banana Pro update)
4. Update CLAUDE.md to reference workflow

Reference: docs/ENDPOINTS.md, docs/ADD_TOOL_GUIDE.md

title: Update bytedance_seedream_image tool to support Seedream 4.5
